extendedInfo.description: NOVA: Northern Virginia Community CollegeThis is the OFFICIAL mobile resource app for the Northern Virginia Community College (NVCC) and will always be a FREE download.NOVA wants you to stay connected, even while on the go. The NOVA app provides instant access to the NOVA virtual tour, the NOVA events calendar and other important NOVA information including how to apply for courses and who to contact at NOVA Admissions if you have questions.The NOVA app has features for both the new and current students interested or attending the Northern Virginia Community College.The NOVA app offers access to:- Virtual Tours of the NOVA campuses and centers- Events and NOVA Calendars- NVCC Degrees & Certificates- Quick Facts about NOVA- How to Apply to NOVA- Contacts for AdmissionsNOVA is the Northern Virginia Community College (NVCC) and is the second largest community college in the United States with over 70,000 students enrolled. NOVA offers a quality education to those in the Virginia, Washington DC and Maryland areas who seek an affordable alternative to a traditional 4 year school, with flexible courses, intelligent professors, campus-like settings, and the ability to graduate and pursue work or to transfer and continue their education. Our goal is to promote student success and build brighter futures.  To learn more about Northern Virginia Community College (NVCC) please visit us at http://www.nvcc.edu.Version Disclaimer: This app has been designed and optimized to run on operating platforms currently supported by Android.The NOVA app will always be free. Do not pay for non-official NVCC, NOVA or Northern Virginia Community College branded applications.

reviews.title: Current Student
reviews.comment: I know what everyone is talking about and how you feel.  We all are/were expecting the same thing. I kind of went around it to get to meet my email and other stuff.. go to how to apply, scroll down,  hit \"visit our website\" it will bring up the home page of NOVA and then just sign into \"my nova\" then go from there like you would do from a regular computer.  It may be a pain but it\'s a way. They do need to get an actual mobile app! For the BB APP go into app store, search \"learn bb\" and there\'s blackboard!
reviews.author: Kim Felton

reviews.comment: If I could just give it ZERO STARS!
reviews.author: Daniela Tamayo

reviews.title: Oh man...
reviews.comment: This app does basically nothing. Can\'t log in to MyNova,which is the only thing anyone would want it for. Uninstalling. Maybe good for brand new students...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only good for those how are brand new I disentangle even have address for the campuses with out diging

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Downloaded it and the backgrounds are transparent so you can\'t read anything, dull, and pointless. Disappointed.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Thought I could get access to my nova and college information since I was unable to sign up for nova alert. Please release something that we can keep up with the college.
